name: Marshini Chetty
content: HOME | Marshini Chetty top of pageI'm an associate professor in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Chicago. I also direct the Amyoli Internet Research Lab, or AIR lab for short, where our goal is to make the Internet more trustworthy. I am committed to conduct research that is both rigorous and impactful. Research Areas: I work in the field of Human-Computer Interaction with research interests in usable privacy and security and ubiquitous computing. In a nutshell, I study how people use the Internet and build technologies to empower Internet users over Internet performance, networked privacy and security, and data costs. ​ ​ Side note: My first name is pronounced Marsh-Knee - the first "i" is silent.Associate Professor Department of Computer Science University of Chicago ﻿Address: John Crerar Library 355 5730 S Ellis Avenue Chicago, IL, 606037 ​ Email: ﻿marshini at uchicago dot edu ​ Tel: 773-702-2323 ​ ​ ​ ​bottom of page
